TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Falling, that's what.

What is the square root of rope?

A circle.

Is there more than one way to skin a cat?

It depends on the spoon you use.

Why did the crew of Apollo 10 experience an encounter of the turd kind during their flight?

"i am the great mighty poo

and im going to throw my s*** at you

a huge suply of thish

come from my chcolate star fish

how about some scat you little tw*t"

How come there is no vtol toilets?

Because toilets are afraid of heights.

Stuffs?

Nuffs

How much wood could a wood chuck chuck if a wood chuck could chuck norris?

As many fuds as a fudpucker could puck if a fudpucker drank Powerthirst.

How I mine for boosters?

With a shovel.

What's the isp of a logitech steering wheel?

Depends, How long have you been sitting in the chair?

Am I?

Yes, you aren't

How does one respond humorously?

1. Sacrifice a yearling chicken to Fleb, the god of upper arm bones.

2. Go to an online forum (bonus points if you go in person) and post something about Runescape gold.

3. ???

4. Profit.

When does 0.24 come out?

When Squad will release it, duh.

(stupid awnser of destruction and internal madness )

What does it mean to be a good person?

To not be you.

How do I understand quantum mechanics?

you sit under an apple tree and watch the bananas fall.

Where can I find the mun?

Go to Minmus and then fly to the smalest rock near Kerbin.

How does I tell a joke?

You open your oral orifice and let sound spill forth.

When can I go to sleep?

Just flip this switch to the off position and sleep!

How do I shower?

Go to the local metal shop and stand next to a grinder.

When can I play?

You had your chance two minutes ago!

How do I space?

You see that big, long, rectangular key near the bottom of your keyboard? Try that.

How do I calculate?

Take a calculator and eat it. Must be a TI-84 or higher.

Why won't my car fly?

Because it is still thinking about the ground. Drive it off a cliff and then hit it with a hammer to distract it.

How?

Throw a door knob

How do i human

You have to find a dog and eat it

Is gas dangerous?

Yes. Never use gas. At all

What will happen if I shoot my head?
